Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Toronto in 2015...
Injured on 3/23/2015 with a Fractured Hip, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Toronto to Philadelphia on 5/20/2015 (Going to PHI: RF Leonardo Molina. Going to TOR: SS Roman Quinn, C Jose Herrera, P David Palladino)...
Injured on 7/21/2015 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Injured on 8/13/2015 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2016, off Yovani Gallardo (MIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/28/2016, off Huston Street (SD)...
Drove in 6 runs against Tampa Bay on 7/17/2016...
Hit for the cycle against New York (N) on 4/16/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2018, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,835,714 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2019, hitting .524 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2019, hitting .412 with 6 HR, 17 RBI...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,907,143 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Milwaukee on 5/20/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against San Diego on 8/16/2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,114,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/13/2021 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 2 weeks...
10/3/2021: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $20,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2023, hitting .357 with 7 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/4/2026 to a 5-year deal worth $25,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2026 Allstar game...
